metadata.title: CVE-2021-20296 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: A flaw was found in OpenEXR in versions before 3.0.0-beta. A crafted input file supplied by an attacker, that is processed by the Dwa decompression functionality of OpenEXR's IlmImf library, could cause a NULL pointer dereference. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to system availability.

criterions.comment: openexr package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
